name: search_agent
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool zillow.
Tool description: Fast and highly available API. For-sale, rental listings and agens real-time data from Zillow.
API description: Search for an agent's information using the Zillow API.

page.description: The page number of the search results to retrieve. Defaults to None.

locationtext.description: The location to search for agents, which can be a city name (e.g., 'Newport Beach') or a zip code (e.g., '90278'). Defaults to 'Newport Beach'.

name.description: The name of the agent to search for. Defaults to None.
